attributes.action: MPs who avoided prosecution should now be prosecuted over expenses.
attributes.additional_details:
Given the cross-party support displayed by MPs on Thursday 11th August 2011
for the stern measures proposed by the PM for all rioters involved in theft.
Can the House now demonstrate support for Fair Justice for ALL, by having all those MPs who avoided prosecution over the theft of expenses, brought back to the Courts and prosecuted for theft.
